name: TRUE RELIGION MEN'S ANTHONY BRUSHED TWILL CARGOS WHITE SIZE 33
description:
AUTHENTIC TRUE RELIGION MEN'S ANTHONY BRUSHED TWILL CARGOS WHITE SIZE 33 Runs big FITS LIKE A SIZE 35



 A classic cargo pant looks great all year round in our Anthony. In White, the durable fabric soaks the rich color then goes through a heavy wash for maximum comfort and a vintage look. Multiple compartments are an added feature to this fully functional pant. Oversize copper rivets and signature embroidered pockets raises the stakes on casual wear.

 Size Runs Big... 2 sizes lower than your normal size is a perfect fit 1 size lower is a little room to breath but tighten with drawstrings. Also drawstrings at hem making inseam adjustable to be smaller. Just tie the strings to ankle and tuck in to a perfect fit. Please read description below. We have other sizes. Email us with any questions.





Also since these pants are white. They may have little dirt marks or dust marks from being moved around from store to store but totally washable and removable. Each pants are inspected and are new authentic with tags.

•10 1/2" front rise
•16 3/4" back rise
•21" leg opening
•Draw cord at waist  

•Stainless buttons and copper rivets  
•Zip fly

•100% cotton
•Machine wash cold     

•Imported
•Actual Measurements: Waist from left to right 18 1/2 inches (total waist 37 inches), Inseam 32 inches (easy to adjust and fit to smaller inseam and/or waist with drawstrings) runs big in size.
